overview: The boy Siam Mehraf loved his lover, but the girl got a celebrity singer called Nafiul Islam Ishaan and left him. Then the boy Siam Mehraf gets in trouble for a long time. He faced many problems, he was depressed. After the bad time gone he succeeds. This is the story told from the mouth of that successful boy Siam Mehraf to two person. But also there is a little twist at the end of the film Opurnota.
title: Opurnota
